pl.myrecipebasket.service

Class VoteService

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.myrecipebasket.service.VoteService

  • @Service
public class VoteService
extends java.lang.Object
    Object VoteService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (UserRepository & VoteRepository & RecipeRepository) and view layer (VoteController). Contains all Vote related business logic of MyRecipeBasket application.
    See Also:
    UserRepository, VoteRepository, RecipeRepository, VoteController

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VoteService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addVote(java.lang.String voteType, Recipe recipe, User user)
      This method creates new Vote object and persists it in MyRecipeBasket database.
      Vote getVoteByUserAndRecipe(User user, Recipe recipe)
      This method retrieves single Vote object that had been left by particular User and concerns specific Recipe
      void setRecipeRepository(RecipeRepository recipeRepository)
      This method injects RecipeRepository object into VoteService and enables VoteService to perform CRUD operations on Recipe database table.
      void setUserRepository(UserRepository userRepository)
      This method injects UserRepository object into VoteService and enables VoteService to perform CRUD operations on User database table.
      void setVoteRepository(VoteRepository voteRepository)
      This method injects VoteRepository object into VoteService and enables VoteService to perform CRUD operations on Vote database table.
      void updateVote(Vote vote, Recipe recipe, User user)
      This method updates VoteType of existing Vote and makes corresponding changes in UpVote & DownVote fields of the Recipe that the Vote considers.

    • Method Detail

      • setUserRepository

        @Autowired
public void setUserRepository(UserRepository userRepository)
        This method injects UserRepository object into VoteService and enables VoteService to perform CRUD operations on User database table.
        Parameters:
        userRepository - UserRepository object

      • setVoteRepository

        @Autowired
public void setVoteRepository(VoteRepository voteRepository)
        This method injects VoteRepository object into VoteService and enables VoteService to perform CRUD operations on Vote database table.
        Parameters:
        voteRepository - VoteRepository object

      • setRecipeRepository

        @Autowired
public void setRecipeRepository(RecipeRepository recipeRepository)
        This method injects RecipeRepository object into VoteService and enables VoteService to perform CRUD operations on Recipe database table.
        Parameters:
        recipeRepository - RecipeRepository object

      • getVoteByUserAndRecipe

        public Vote getVoteByUserAndRecipe(User user,
                                   Recipe recipe)
        This method retrieves single Vote object that had been left by particular User and concerns specific Recipe
        Parameters:
        user - User whose Vote is being looked for
        recipe - Recipe which the Vote that is being looked for should concern
        Returns:
        Vote object

      • addVote

        public void addVote(java.lang.String voteType,
                    Recipe recipe,
                    User user)
        This method creates new Vote object and persists it in MyRecipeBasket database.
        Parameters:
        voteType - type of Vote left by User
        recipe - Recipe which the Vote concerns
        user - User who left the Vote

      • updateVote

        public void updateVote(Vote vote,
                       Recipe recipe,
                       User user)
        This method updates VoteType of existing Vote and makes corresponding changes in UpVote & DownVote fields of the Recipe that the Vote considers.
        Parameters:
        vote - updated Vote left by User
        recipe - Recipe witch the new Vote considers
        user - User who updated Vote
